channel.title: Smf Help
channel.description: Hello, I have decided to help people with SMF code...Now some might say," Smf does not require a code it has no CSS on smfforfree either...Well thats where you wrong view my forum [url=http://exilescape.co.nr]here[/url] it has add ons that didn't come with SMF...So i can help you make your forum as custom as mine. Just post here you could use this...Then post your forum URL and i will register then you make me admin then i make your forum custom...TOTALLY FREE! The only thing i'm going to require is a link to my site...No big its just a little thing

item.title: Smf Help
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:10, topic:107574”]Yeah, really

You don’t download a website to put it on yours, lul.
And, if you have access to the database, maybe you can move the forum.

http://www.simplemachines.org/

That exilescape forum is trash too. It looks horrible.[/quote]

look at my new one…Updated! http://exilescape.co.nr updated!! better promise

Read full topic

item.title: Smf Help
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

[quote=".Fusion, post:7, topic:107574"][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=153989.msg1450953#msg1450953 date=1181327222]
Ok… SMF coding is the easiest thing to do. And no offense but your forums arn’t all that great (Fr33sc4p3 beats them by a long shot :D) First you only have 7 topics. 2nd You couldnt change the newposts/no new post images… 3rd the background is still the same. You could have atleast got the runescape stone background… and you only have 7 posts
[/quote]
Smf coding? SMF is not a language bud.

SMFFORFREE=gay.

l2program[/quote]
kk. But uhh…How do i download the Smfforfree to put on my website http://projectmojo.5gbfree.com ???

Read full topic
